ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents The Dark One: Age of Darkness One-Shot
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dark One has grown tired of being second in command to the Dark Queen but he finds he's helpless to stop her. However, the true reason for his hatred toward her runs much deeper into their shared past. And it's a past that will now be revealed here!
Age of Darkness Tie-in
